name: RoboCharger (technosander, thevruniverse)
description:
It's the year 2169. You have been called up to the military to fight robots. But before you do this, you want to call your family for the last time. But when you try to call, you realise the plane has already taken off. And that's not the worst part of story...  And apparently your phone played a bigger role than you thought...  

So: KEEP YOUR PHONE ALIVE!

 (this game is made for the jam of ludum dare 46 in 3 days)
